title: Chinese solar stocks rally on reports Elon Musk's Space X, Tesla staff visited suppliers
summary_full: Shares of Chinese solar panel makers surged after a team of staff sent by Elon Musk had reportedly visited several photovoltaic suppliers in China.
summary_public: Shares of Chinese solar panel makers surged after a team of staff sent by Elon Musk had reportedly visited several photovoltaic suppliers in China.
